About Me

Cheng Gu

Hi, my name is Cheng Gu. I love Game Programming, and everything related to Computer Graphics!

My Skills

My Projects

A Tragedy of Little Chicks -using P5.js

A web game Inspired by Snake VS Block. The storyline is The Chicken Mother needs to fight with bad animals for saving her children. First programming project.

...   ...

Suzuka Wants to Fly (Compatible with VR) -using Unity3D

A VR Demo Aimed to reduce the problem of motion sickness, used a third person view Spiderman style swinging game demo to try to discover a new world in visual reality for reducing this adverse consequence. In this Project, I create everything by myself, such as the building blocks, character model, particles, animations, and many game mechanics such as swinging moving, wall walking, battle system, and wall walking. Also, I created an infinite city generator instead of spending time on level design.

...   ...

Beyond Atlantis -using TouchDesigner & Arduino

An installation project which used the versatility of projection mapping and the depth of infinity mirrors to show a piece that would inspire curiosity about the wonders, beauty, and unknowns that lie deep beneath the surface of what the human eye can perceive; the deep sea.

...   ...

Troubadour - using Unity

An RPG Rhythm Game Demo that collaborated with Game Design & Art Students in the Game Prototype class. Functions Includes Inventory System, Data Saving and Loading, Dialogue, Social Media, Rhythm Gameplay, UI framework, and Storyline, Shopping, Evolving, and so on.

...   ...

Animated Led Sign - using Arduino & P5.js

An Animated Led Sign built for my Major, be able to send msg to Adafruit and change the Led Animation and the Motor movement states.

...   ...

CatBox - using Unity & Node.js & Vuforia

A Multiplayer AR Game, aimed to create an interactive game which will be like a combination of a marker based “Poké mon Go” Game and Flag Capturing style game. A competitive game that makes players choose a team and try their best to collect the markers around the campus for better score.

...   ...

Voice Basketball Machine - using Unity & Waston & Vuforia

An AR basketball shooting game, shoot methods include swap screen and voice command by using Watson API.

...   ...

3D Props Modelling & Texturing - using Maya & Quixel & Photoshop

Modeled and Textured some props for the 3D game art fundmental class.

NeverLand

A Level Design and Unity Shader Programming Project for creating a beautiful cartoon environment
